ComicInfo.Summary: Destroyer Part 9: Tyranny and Mutation: With Evil Ernie finally blown into oblivion, the world tries to pull itself out of the nuclear nightmare he has caused. Homicide secretly resurrects his dead brother. Billy is reunited with his sisters but cannot explain to them how he came back from the dead. Ramsey is picked up and tapped to be the next president of the United States. The ARA is disbanded. Dr. Price gets a message from God and finds that he can control the radioactive Dead Onez of Detroit. Made of the same green energy that powered Ernie, Janelle Armstrong resurrects the evil one and a better and badder Evil Ernie is born.
ComicInfo.Title: Destroyer Part 9: Tyranny and Mutation
ComicInfo.Writer: Brian Pulido,Phil Nutman,Philip Nutman,Brian Pulido,Philip Nutman
